description: An anime-only Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that gives the user the ability to produce and control vast amounts of heat, making them a 10,000 Degree Human. The user can regulate their body temperature from freezing environments to temperatures hot enough to create lava.

abilities.description: User can generate extreme heat up to 10,000 degrees Celsius from their body.
User can regulate their body temperature to survive in both freezing and extremely hot environments including lava.
User can melt anything they touch through extreme heat, including ice and metal.
User can create steam from their body to propel themselves through the air.

techniques.description: Creates balls of heat that can be thrown at opponents.
Creates a steam whirlwind and surrounds an opponent with it.
Gradually increases temperature with visual changes to the user's appearance.
Lava manipulation while immersed in molten material.
A heated belly-flop attack using the user's extreme temperature.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, the user becomes weakened and unable to swim when submerged in seawater.
The heat output scales with the user's emotional state, which can be unpredictable.

trivia: The Atsu Atsu no Mi is extremely similar to the canon Netsu Netsu no Mi eaten by Charlotte Oven, both in naming and functionality.
Don Accino's heat powers are what maintain the tropical environment of Lovely Land within the frozen region of Hyokaido.
The fruit allows Don Accino to reach temperatures of 10,000 degrees Celsius, hot enough to destroy arctic geography and cause volcanic vents to erupt.
